mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO br_products (`name`, amount, price, `POINT`, discount_price, category, `explain`) VALUES (#{name},#{amount},#{price},#{point},#{discountPrice},#{category},#{explain})
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() as no
mapper.select: SELECT A.product_no AS "no", A.`name`, A.amount, A.price, A.`POINT`, A.discount_price AS "discountPrice", A.category, A.reg_date AS "regDate", A.reviews, A.explain FROM br_products A WHERE A.product_no = #{value}

SELECT A.product_no AS "no", A.`name`, A.amount, A.price, A.`POINT`, A.discount_price AS "discountPrice", A.category, A.reg_date AS "regDate", A.reviews, A.explain FROM br_products A
WHERE name like concat ('%',#{searchValue},'%')
WHERE category like concat ('%',#{searchValue},'%')
JOIN br_product_tag B ON A.product_no = B.product_no WHERE B.product_tag LIKE concat ('%',#{searchValue},'%')
ORDER BY A.product_no DESC
LIMIT #{pagination.beginIndex}, #{pagination.endIndex}
SELECT product_no as "no", image_path as "imagePath" FROM br_product_image_path WHERE product_no = #{value}
SELECT product_no AS "no", product_tag AS "tag" FROM br_product_tag WHERE product_no = #{value}
mapper.update: UPDATE br_products SET `name` = #{name}, amount = #{amount}, price = #{price}, `point` = #{point}, discount_price = #{discountPrice}, category = #{category}, `EXPLAIN` = #{explain} WHERE product_no = #{no}
